description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This game is perfect for all ages; left, right and jump is all that’s needed. The beautiful soundtrack, smooth gameplay and visuals of the environments bring this game to life, making the game very enjoyable and relaxing to play.
